subject: AI & Agents
title: Synthetic Data Generation
description: A fast breakdown of Synthetic Data Generation for builders.

hook.text: No real data? Generate synthetic data that looks real enough to train on.

buildup.text: Synthetic data generation creates artificial training examples that mimic real distributions.

discovery.text: Use cases: privacy (no real PII), rare events (fraud simulation), and data augmentation.

twist.text: Models trained on synthetic data can inherit the generator's biases and blind spots.

climax.text: Validate synthetic data against real data distributions before using it for training.

punchline.text: Fake data, real utility. If done carefully.

quiz.question: Why is synthetic data useful for privacy?
options: It contains no real personal information
